name: Epilepsy Self-Care with Streator Unlimited
description:
A first-person, point-and-click storybook game designed as an educational tool for individuals with epilepsy and an Intellectual Development Disorder.  The player will go through a day in the life of an individual with epilepsy, completing tasks related to self-care habits that reduce the risk of experiencing an epileptic seizure. Multiple solutions allow for the player to make decisions based on their real-life preferences, and randomized options provide unique gameplay and opportunities for critical thinking.

This game was developed for use by Streator Unlimited, Inc., but is freely available to all. Check out more about Streator Unlimited, Inc. here: http://streatorunlimited.org
